name: Royal Escort
Lore: 'When away from the Imperial Palace on Coruscant, the Emperor is protected by legions of troops. Typically this force includes soldiers trained to fight in local environment.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Each of your non-unique troopers on Endor or Death Star II is forfeit +1. When opponent just used a weapon to target your character aboard a piloted vehicle, that character may use that vehicle''s defense value.',
